alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 4:42AM AKDT until October 16 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be hazardous due to slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized ice accumulation amounts around one quarter of an inch are possible along the Edgerton Highway and the Richardson Highway south of the Edgerton Highway junction. The highest snow totals are expected in western portions of the Copper River Basin. Temperatures will slowly warm above freezing from south to north through the latter half of Saturday, with most locations changing to all rain by Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
